bibl.title: Judaea and Mediterranean Politics, 219 to 161 B.C.E. (Brill's Series in Jewish Studies. 8.)
bibl.note: Introduction. - I. Between Ptolemies and Seleucids. - II. The Tobiads: Fiction and History. - III. Rome and the Kingdoms of the East: 201-175. - IV. Antiochus IV and the Kings of the South. - V. From Eleusis to Tabae. - VI. Events in Judaea: 168-163. - VII. The King's Men. - Afterword. Bibliography. Index locorum. General Index.
GERA Dov, Judaea and Mediterranean Politics, 219 to 161 B.C.E. (Brill's Series in Jewish Studies. 8.)
